attributes.comment:
Please do not raise the amounts in this fee schedule. My husband and I have
wanted for many years now to adopt, but the amount we are required to raise is
staggering - between $20,000 and $30,000 per child depending on the country!
We are currently considering closing out our retirement savings account in order to
facilitate adopting. We are frustrated that the adoption process is so costly.
Surely this discourages many families from proceeding, and how sad this is for the
children who could become family members! And, surely society is made
stronger with each child that is rescued from an orphanage and set in a family.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Awara Fernandez
